title: Create principle-integration-specialist for automated principle loading

description.summary: Missing specialist for automated principle sequence loading (CLAUDE.md:54). Need systematic application of directive → workflow → fundamental → engineering → git-workflow → dynamic-adaptation → context-efficiency → agent-selection → task-orchestration → task-tool-syntax → agent-definition → expert-documentation → simplicity → communication → organization → formatting → files → forbidden → claude-md
description.business_value: Core framework initialization requires automated principle loading to ensure consistent system operation
description.technical_scope: Develop specialist agent for principle sequence enforcement and validation
success_criteria: Agent successfully loads principle sequence in correct order
Validates principle application across system components

functional: Validate principle order: directive → workflow → fundamental → engineering → etc

implementation.approach: Deploy component-extraction-specialist to create dedicated principle integration agent
implementation.validation: Four-gate validation system with principle compliance verification
implementation.testing: Comprehensive principle loading and validation testing

risks.mitigation: Strict sequence validation and error handling

acceptance_criteria: Agent created with complete principle loading functionality
